short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps record of the PR and Issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy GitHub PR and issue links to boost your efficiency. On any PR or issue page, the extension offers two formatted URLs for easy copying. These links are then saved like a simple clipboard history for quick reference.
